summary: "Little Red Riding Hood" is a classic European fairy tale about a girl and a clever wolf. The story comes from old folk tales and was made famous by Charles Perrault and the Brothers Grimm. It has changed a lot over time with different tellings and adaptations. Sometimes it's called "Little Red Cap" or just "Red Riding Hood". It's grouped with other folk tales as number 333 in the Aarne-Thompson system.
title: Little Red Riding Hood
